cell.paragraph: The EiffelVision2 Dialog item is a new Eiffel Class, DIALOG that represents a Vision2 dialog, inheriting EV_DIALOG
Default feature clauses are contained within the class text, and two pre-defined features are contained:

list.item: intialize - Redefined from EV_DIALOG, this feature performs the initialization of the dialog, and any custom initialization required for your dialog, can be added here. intialize is executed as a result of calling default_create on the dialog.
is_in_default_state - Is the dialog in the correct default state after initialization? If you wish to check the default state of your dialog, add code to perform this here.
